= Download =

The latest [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/files/jbiowh-2.0.3-SNAPSHOT.jar JBioWH] stable version. 

Check the [SystemRequirements System requirements] and the [InstallationGuide Installation Guide] before use it.

The MySQL script to create the relational database is [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/warehouse.sql warehouse.sql]

== !JavaDoc ==

The latest [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/javadoc/index.html JavaDoc] generated.

== MySQL Workbench Project ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/MySQLWorkBench/warehouse.mwb MySQL Workbench Project] to visualize and modify the relational schema. 

= Updates =

== Update a relational schema from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.0.2-to-2.0.3.sql this] script to update an existing relational schema from version 2.0.2 to 2.0.3.

From the MySQL database run:

{{{
   source <path-to-downloaded-sql-script>;
}}}
